thread.title: Gummy worm vs. Senko: Which is better for bass? | Video
thread.title_full: Gummy worm vs. Senko: Which is better for bass? | Video | NOLA.com

author: Todd Masson, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Gummy worm vs. Senko: Which is better for bass? | Video
text:
Bass anglers are the Rainmen of the fishing world, paying an other-worldly level of attention to minutiae that others would find irrelevant. For instance, a green-trout chaser who's catching fish on a crankbait with 13 stripes will have absolutely no confidence in one with only a dozen.
But after watching this video, the bass-fishing community may want to chillax a little bit.
Two buddies set out on a little competition to see which lure would deliver a bigger bass — a Senko or any of an assortment of gummy worms and candies.
Although the Senko may have won the competition, it wasn't by much, and one of the candy baits — a Twizzler — certainly delivered the goods on a day that presented the exact opposite of ideal bass conditions.
Check out the video here:
